description:
Great Opportunity

Company Profile

Combining AI-controlled concentrating solar thermal technology with long-duration thermal energy storage

What's in it for you?

Elwood Professional associates are eligible for a comprehensive and competitive benefits package plus an exclusive savings program, including:

  • Medical/Vision/Dental/Rx plans
  • Holiday Pay
  • Teladoc (online care)
  • Referral Bonus Incentive
  • And More!

Inventory & Logistics Clerk Details

  • Contract position
  • $ 30.00 / hour
  • First Shift ( Monday through Friday )
  • Take responsibility for accurately tracking incoming and outgoing products and report all shortages and deficiencies
  • Coordinate logistics activities, such as transportation, warehousing, and inventory management.
  • Develop and implement logistics plans and procedures to ensure that goods and materials are delivered on time and within budget.
  • Monitor logistics performance metrics, such as delivery times, costs, and inventory levels, and make recommendations for improvements.
  • Negotiate with suppliers, carriers, and other vendors to ensure cost-effective and efficient logistics services.
  • Maintain accurate records of all logistics activities, including shipments, inventory levels, and customer orders (Invoices, packing slips and BOLs.)
  • Receive and inspect damages to document incoming goods and materials
  • Communicate with suppliers, carriers, and internal stakeholders to resolve any issues related to receiving, including quality concerns and delivery delays.
  • Ensure that all shipping and receiving activities are carried out in a timely and efficient manner, and that all shipments are properly documented and tracked.
  • Prepare and distribute reports on warehouse activities, including inventory levels, shipping and receiving performance metrics, and quality control measures.

Inventory & Logistics Clerk Qualifications

  • High school diploma or equivalency certificate and 3+ years of expediting/material handling experience working with aircraft or automotive parts and assemblies.
  • Practical experience operating various inventory management processes/equipment with associated high efficiency and experience with Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and Logistics processes.

Experience operating a forklift and/or material handling motorized vehicles and equipment.

  • Supply Chain experience in support of high-volume manufacturing operations
  • Solid knowledge of data analysis, practical inventory management software use, and continuous process improvement methods.
  • Certifications from CPIM or CSCP and ERP system experience (SAP, Oracle, etc.) desirable

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and celebrate diversity at all levels of our organization.

Our commitment to you: Real People. Fast job offers. No Robots.

How To Apply

Email, call, or text us today! Feel free to apply online at www.elwoodjobs.com !

Daniel Oliver

5230 Carroll Canyon Road

San Diego, CA 92121

(619) 894-8648 ext.

daniel.oliver@elwoodprofessional.com

  • See above for qualifications

#IJ #ST1
